articles.author: hypnotist
articles.description:
Any suggestions/ frameworks on how to learn specific skill, retain the knowledge and be able to share it(in for ex. written form)
I usually jump in straight away and start learning "on the job" but I realised that I forget too much and i do not have any notes to refer to later on.
Examples of specific skill: 
- How to write a good cold email 
- how to learn some snowboarding trick 
- how to store your bitcoin safely 
etc.
Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=28017289
Points: 156
# Comments: 85
articles.title: Ask HN: Do you have a process or a framework to learn specific skills quickly?
